annonstext:
På Cleverex Bemanning arbetar vi med att rekrytera och hyra ut rätt medarbetare till rätt kund. Vårt största fokus ligger på våra kunder, konsulter och kandidater och vårt mål är att du som kandidat ska känna att du hamnat helt rätt!

We are now looking for a Junior Marketing Manager to join Timma! We believe that the right person has previous experience as a consultant or in a similiar role and is now ready to embark on this next step. Don't hesitate to send in your application!

 

About the role

Timma's vision is to lead the way as the most innovative company within the salon industry. At Timma, we know how precious time is, so we develop services that liberate time for you. Timma is a platform for inspiration and bookings so people can indulge themselves in self-pampering services. For salon professionals, we offer an innovative digital salon management tool that helps them connect with their customers and focus their time on what really matters. We are building the future for the people of this industry.

We are now looking for a Junior Marketing Manager to join their office in Hornstull, Stockholm. Here you will become a part of a skilled, dedicated and motivated Nordic marketing team, and be in charge of marketing activities in the Swedish market market, both in B2B and B2C field. In this role, you will both be responsible together with sales team to grow Timma’s brand awareness  as well as establish the marketing function in the Stockholm offce.

In this role, you can except to become a part of a tightly knit team in Stockholm but you will work accross the Nordics and especially closely with the team in Finland. This is a great position for someone who craves a lot of freedom as well as repsonsibility in regards of your role and creativity. You can expect to enter a interesting and fast-growing industry and be a part of building up a company.

 

This is a recruitment process handled by Cleverex. You will be employed and work at Timma. 

 

Description of the role

The role as a Junior Marketing Manager is divided in both strategic and operative tasks. The strategic part of the role entails analysis of marketing performance and conducting market surverys and insight analysis. The operative part of the role entail tasks such as:

• Manage local social media channels
• Create content for newsletters, marketing automations, social media and website (SEO-friendly)
• Coordinate local influencer campaigns and other collaborations
• Create and translate presentations
• Translate content in local language
• Book advertising placements and coordinate content
• Update local marketing calendar
• Support sales team with various tasks

We believe that the right person enjoys both content creation as well as analysis.

 

Your profile

• Minimum of Bachelor’s degree in marketing or a related field. It is considered meritious if you have studied at Berghs or Hyper Island.
• Proficiency in English and Swedish
• Proven work experience in marketing for a minimum of 1-2 years. Preferably experience as a consultant within marketing/similar.
• Demonstrable experience managing SEO, marketing automation, newsletters, social media and/or other advertising campaigns
• Basic knowledge of design tools, for example Photoshop, Indesign.
• Solid knowledge of website and marketing analytics tools

We believe that the you are a person that is curious and creative. Presenting ideas and taking initiative is second nature to you. We believe that a as a marketing manager and colleauge, you have great communicative skills. That is reflected in both your work and in team-based situationens. 

Additional information

• Start: May 2021 or in regards of your notice period
• Location: Stockholm
• Extent: Full time
• Contact information: This recruitment process is conducted by Cleverex and Timma requests that all questions regarding the process goes to Cleverex.
